summary: Defines the abstract Provider interface that orchestrates all aspects of a Feast feature store, including configuration handling, data ingestion, online and offline feature retrieval, materialization of feature views, and management of the underlying infrastructure components. Also supplies a utility to obtain a concrete provider instance based on configuration.
business_intent: To give developers a unified, pluggable abstraction for interacting with the feature store's storage and compute layers, simplifying the implementation of feature engineering pipelines and ensuring consistent lifecycle management across different backend systems.
